trends: There have been 4 other sightings in East Chicago
There were no other sightings in East Chicago on or around October 18th 2011
Summary: blimp like /oval shape/red lights top and bottom
divs: Sighting Detailsspotted while traveling down cline ave in east chicago, thought it was a blimp but appeared to glow unlike a blimp also wind was 25mph and I assume stronger at that height. 2 people viewed this and other cars slowed down to watch this, most people woulnt slow down to watch a blimp! I would say it was probably a military craft. who knows!
